name: water-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Water form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Water.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Water form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Water.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A memory disc that contains Water-type data.
It changes the type of the holder if held by
a certain species of Pokémon.
